author: Karen Windon
text: Manatee County Property Management Department is collecting empirical data for purchase of a Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) also know as Enterprise Asset Management (EAM) packaged software programs.  Our purpose for this software will revolve mainly around Facilities Maintenance aspects and background information pertaining to of all the buildings, equipment, customers, services and physical property that our department is responsible for. What are other governments using for their preventive maintenance and asset tracking functions? Specifically: What Software are you using? Are the users happy with their selections of CMMS software selections? What are the pros and cons of the software you are using? Any suggestions or comments that may be useful? Email tom.roberts@mymanatee.org
title: Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS)
